content.prompt: Leninâ€™s proposals for revolutionary change in Russia are best explained by which of the following intellectual developments?

choices.label: The development of Russian nationalism based on Slavic culture and the Orthodox Church
The development of utopian socialist thought
The development of anarchist theories calling for the dismantling of government
The development of a Marxist critique of industrial society

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
